thread.title: BRIEF-Lloyd's Of London Says Co's Brussels Subsidiary Granted Regulatory Approval | Reuters

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lloyd's Of London Says Co's Brussels Subsidiary Granted Regulatory Approval | Reuters

organizations.name: brief-lloyd's of london says co's brussels subsidiary granted regulatory approval | reuters

text:
May 23 (Reuters) - Lloyd’s of London :
* LLOYD’S OF LONDON SAYS CO’S BRUSSELS SUBSIDIARY GRANTED REGULATORY APPROVAL
* LICENCE MEANS THAT CO CAN WRITE NON-LIFE RISKS FROM EEA, ENSURING CUSTOMERS CAN CONTINUE TO ACCESS MARKET’S SPECIALIST UNDERWRITING
